title: Killer Golem

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You start the game not being able to die. The first time you die, lose your defense but upgrade your attack to Unstoppable.
> If you kill a town member and still have defense, lose your defense and do not upgrade your attack.
> Once you kill 3 people or only 1/3 of the town remains, lose your defense and upgrade your attack.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose the Town.
